pages.text: The Soul Alloy Sword is a contribution to the warriors who possess it. Its ability lets you launch five beams, which normally deals 20% of your swords attack damage each. If you wish to make the $(item)Soul Alloy Sword$() stronger, then the art of $(l:conjuring:basics/basic_gem_tinkering)Gem Tinkering$() will strengthen you so:$(br) $(li)$(#007a18)≈ Haste: Improves the speed you are cabable of swinging the sword.$()

$(li)$(#a80f01)ღ Abundance: Rewards you with more spoils when killing an enemy. Stacks with looting.$()$(br) $(li)$(#4d8184)λ Scope: Disables Sweeping Edge in favor of a large area of effect attack. The damage increases specifically with each gem fitted. $()$(br) $(li)$(#123f89)ʊ Ignorance: Ignores a specific amount of armor per gem fitted.
